title: Exhaust Notes
subtitle: A Car Engine Sound Library
description: As a huge car enthusiast, I was surprised to find there wasn't a place on the internet to hear Exhaust Notes, or car engine rev sounds. So, I made a hotrod haven to enjoy the loud hums and furious notes of naturally aspired vehicles. Check out the engine rev noises of some of the coolest cars today.

title: HHMI
subtitle: Howard Hughes Medical Institute
description: At ForumOne, I worked with a full team on HHMI's Biointeractive.org, a website/tool, with over half a million yearly page views, that brings together a variety of data-rich activities, case studies,high-quality videos and interactive media, that are designed to connect students to big ideas in biology and promote engagement with scientific practices. I had the opporunity to theme and develop a good amount of the new and improved HHMI in Drupal 8 with another Front-End Developer.

title: FudTruk
subtitle: Voted Lehigh Valley's Best Food Truck
description: The FudTruk is a mobile culinary unit on Lehigh University Campus that uses locally sourced food to make incredible sandwiches, quality breakfast/lunch foods and unique dishes. I had the opportunity to completely brand them, from their logo, to their color scheme, to the vinyl wrap for the truck all of which I incorporated in their website. It was an amazing experience!

title: Lehigh Portal Redesign & Development
subtitle: Lehigh's Luminis 5 Campus Portal
description: At Lehigh, I was the Portal Administrator and had the opportunity to completely redesign how it looked and functioned. It was built on older software but I was able to give it a very fresh, user-tested coat of paint as well as added development improvements, like layout restructure for easily accessible information, browser compatability and continually updating content for students. My redesign was graced with PABUG's Best College Portal Redesign for 2017.

title: That's A Cool Website
subtitle: A Curated Collection of Cool Websites
description: Another website for designspiration? Ah, well, this one is a website for websites, but specifically designer, developer, agency websites that are the cream of the crop. It is curated by yours truly so you know it'll be quality work and I'm always taking suggestions.

title: Oscars Trivia
subtitle: Browser Game
description: This is a single player trivia game based on the 2018 Academy Awards (The Oscars). It tests your Oscars knowledge on two levels: a 10 question quiz that asks who won the Oscar for the most popular categories, or all the 24 Oscar categories, for the movie buffs.

title: Gertrude Hawk Goodies
subtitle: Rewards Program Microsite
description: While working at Weidenhammer, I developed a microsite for renowned chocolatiers Gertrude Hawk Chocolates. They wanted a clear cut, and simple rewards microsite where chocolate lovers can sign up to be a part of their rewards program designed to reward you with free chocolate!

title: Astral Air Parts
subtitle: Aircraft Part Supplier
description: Astral Air Products is a vendor of strong, high-quality fasteners, screws, and bolts that can be found in dozens of types of major products across many industries, like space shuttles, commerical aircrafts, jets and cars. A small but mighty industry, these little nuts are the glue that holds America tight. I was given designs and tasked to bring this website to life exactly.

title: Keystone Munitions
subtitle: Premium Ammunition
description: You need solid, accurate, reliable ammunition, Keystone Munitions is where you go. Their passion is all about feeding your firearms with quality bullets. Their website was a resounding success, with their product now being available in over 20 locations than before.
offcolor: linear-gradient(to left top, rgb(251, 199, 82), rgb(49, 48, 35), rgb(0, 0, 0))

title: Paul Knakk
subtitle: Country Musician
description: Country artist Paul Knakk wanted a fresh, modern website that he could easily maintain; a perfect candidate for a Drupal site! He was able to update content with ease and I integrated his Google Calendar to populate showtimes on the site. He is currently in hiatus.
